757470.name: Doom Roller
757470.description:
Doom Roller is a fast paced physics based puzzle arcade game. Apply force to the ball and guide it through the level avoiding obstacles and the dreaded Orb of Doom! Collect all the gems within time to proceed to the next level. There's an evil twist though... every time you collect a gem your time decreases by five(5) seconds! You can easily design levels for the game using the level editor that comes with the game.


Doom Roller uses the Flax Engine. Copyright 2012 – 2024, Wojciech Figat. All rights reserved.
